Hello!

I'm Justyn

pronounced just(in)

Iâ€™m a digital nomad with a passion for writing, taking photos and helping others live their best life. I share personal travel stories as well as tips for finding the best wifi, cafes and working spaces around the world. I have been traveling for just about 3 years now and have been lucky enough to fund my traveling through working remote.

My happiest days are spent sipping coffee at little cafes and exploring new cities around the world.
